metadata.title: CVE-2017-15047 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The clusterLoadConfig function in cluster.c in Redis 4.0.2 allows attackersto cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds array index and applicationcrash) or possibly have unspecified other impact by leveraging "limitedaccess to the machine."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15047` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

redis-sentinel - 2:3.0.6-1ubuntu0.2
redis-server - 2:3.0.6-1ubuntu0.2
redis-tools - 2:3.0.6-1ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: redis package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:3.0.6-1ubuntu0.2').
